result.eng: I said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.
result.ga: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidin

result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-ṁoċ ar maidinI said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.

result.eng: I woke up early in the morning.
result.ga: Mhúscail mé go moch ar maidin
result.orig: Mhúscail mé go moch ar maidin

result.ponchtml: Ṁúscail mé go moċ ar maidinI woke up early in the morning.

result.eng: I have to get up early in the morning.

result.eng: Do you get up early in the morning?

result.ponchtml: An éiríonn siḃ go moċ ar maidinDo you get up early in the morning?

result.eng: She was on an early-morning flight to Ireland.
